quote.issuer_name: Shanxi Installation Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Shanxi Installation Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Shanxi Installation Group Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the provision of construction services. The Company operates through four segments. The Specialized Industrial Construction segment provides investment, design consulting, construction, operation and maintenance services for specialized industrial construction projects. The Specialized Auxiliary Construction segment provides services such as investment, design consulting, construction, operation and maintenance for specialized auxiliary construction projects related to the urban supporting works. The Other Construction segment provides construction services and general contracting services for residential, office and commercial buildings, science, education, culture and health buildings and other types of projects. The Non- construction Business segment is engaged in the sales of liquefied natural gas (LNG) and the provision of urban heating technical services, and others.
